Html:
Ok, maybe I m blind - didn t find any topic

 

Either way - Why does it suggest for me to get up to 56 expertise raiting with DW DK Tank ? I know that 56 is hard cap, but isn t it too much ?

BTW: If I click Additive Mittigation it doesn t need 56 but 26 (soft cap) only - should be enough, right ?

It's trying to reduce Parry Haste to 0.  So you can disable Parry Haste, and you'll see that go back to reasonable levels.

Also, the DK modules are being re-written so we'll have a whole new batch of bugs coming for Cata.
Ok, thx. BTW I can t set my rotation details to custom.... Not even in Rawr3, it just keeps skipping back on predefined ones.
Yup.  There's already a defect about that.
